thread.title: Virginia Jensen Customer
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Virginia Jensen Customer

author: Virginia Jensen Customer
title: Virginia Jensen Customer
text: this is the first time I have put a mat on my art. I was thinking it would be really complicated. The help aids on the site really helped me, even with the weighted bottom measurements. I am very pleased with the mats and will be using Matboard's site again in the future.
